metadata.title: CVE-2021-21205 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in navigation in Google Chrome on iOS priorto 90.0.4430.72 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
